metadata.synopsis: Otterdance Fenton, Refugee 09, is happy to be part of a community, even if it is a refugee camp.

0.speaker: Otterdance Fenton
0.text: Never been to Baldur's Gate, not sure how many gnomes are there. Sure hope I find some kind of gnomish community behind those walls.

1.speaker: Otterdance Fenton
1.text: Glad to see you! Glad to see anybody, really. It was a lonely road getting here through those abandoned farmlands, and I'm a sociable sort.
